title: Little Alchemy 1 & 2: How to Make Yoda and Force Knight

steps.title: Combine Jedi + Swamp to create Yoda.
steps.content: Combine Jedi + Swamp to create Yoda. This combination will only work to create Yoda in Little Alchemy 1 , and there are no other elements that can be created from it. Here's the fastest way to create it: Air +Fire = Energy Earth + Fire = Lava Air + Lava = Stone Fire + Stone = Metal Metal + Stone = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Energy + Sword = Lightsaber Water + Earth = Mud Water + Air = Rain Earth + Rain = Plant Mud + Plant = Swamp Swamp + Energy = Life Earth + Life = Human Lightsaber + Human = Jedi Jedi + Swamp = Yoda

steps.title: Combine Human + Light sword to create Force knight.
steps.content: Combine Human + Light sword to create Force knight. This is the only Star Wars -inspired element in Little Alchemy 2. [1] X Research source Here's the fastest way to create it: With Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Primordial soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Fire = Metal Stone + Metal = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Fire + Fire = Energy Sword + Energy = Light sword Human + Light sword = Force knight Without Time : Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Fire = Metal Stone + Metal = Blade Blade + Metal = Sword Sword + Energy = Light sword Human + Light sword = Force knight

steps.title: Force knight + Sword also creates Light sword.
steps.content: Force knight + Sword also creates Light sword. This is the only other recipe that uses the Force knight element.
